sentences.english: A depressive disorder is not the same as a passing blue mood.
sentences.chinese: 抑郁障碍跟一晃而过的忧郁情绪还不一样。

sentences.english: Objective To study the efficacy of paroxetine with buspirone in the treatment of depression.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨丁螺环酮与帕罗西汀联合治疗抑郁症的效果。

sentences.english: Psychiatrists say serious depression may have been the main reason for the killing.
sentences.chinese: 严重的抑郁症可能是她犯案的主要原因之一。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the relationship between post-stroke depression and social sustain and coping style with an aim to guide the prospective psychological intervention.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑卒中后抑郁与社会支持及应对方式的关系。

sentences.english: Objective: To probe into the effect of emotion nursing to improve post-stroke depression for cerebral apoplexy patients.
sentences.chinese: 探讨情志护理对改善脑卒中后病人的抑郁状态效果。

sentences.english: When the women reached age 40, Leupp measured their levels of depression .
sentences.chinese: 等到她们40岁时，莱普分别测试她们的抑郁程度。

sentences.english: And I’m DEFINITELY not convinced that coffee has antidepressant effects.
sentences.chinese: 并且我真的不确定咖啡有抗抑郁作用。

sentences.english: These hypothesized functions for PPD are far from proved.
sentences.chinese: 这些对于产后抑郁症作用的假设还远未得到证实。

sentences.english: ConclusionsImproving communication methods can decrease the depressive level of the patients with stroke dysphasia.
sentences.chinese: 结论改善沟通可以降低脑卒中语言障碍患者抑郁程度。

sentences.english: For mild to moderate depression, psychotherapy may be the best option.
sentences.chinese: 对于轻到中度抑郁，心理疗法将是最佳治疗选择。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo screen the antidepressant fraction of the flower of Albizzia julibrissin Durazz(Hehuanhua).
sentences.chinese: 目的合欢花抗抑郁作用有效部位的筛选。

sentences.english: That's an inconvenience many winter depressives can live with.
sentences.chinese: 这对许多冬日抑郁者来说很不方便。

sentences.english: No wonder we feel good and depression is left in the dust.
sentences.chinese: 难怪我们感觉良好，抑郁被抛于九天云外。

sentences.english: To investigate the distribution and frequency of symptoms in manic- depressive disorder.
sentences.chinese: 目的调查住院躁狂和抑郁症的症状分布和频度。

sentences.english: How do children and teens experience depression?
sentences.chinese: 儿童和青少年如何感受抑郁？

sentences.english: The whole male colleague students of Changchun city are slight depressive.
sentences.chinese: 长春市男大学生总体表现出轻度抑郁状态。
